name: Sustainable design for exterior lighting
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: It is important that lighting not only creates the right ambience, safety and security, but also does not create ‘over-lighting’/light pollution generally and for the wildlife in the immediate vicinity in particular.

presentations.name: The Right Tool for the Job – Sustainable External Lighting
presentations.speakers: David Linville-Boud, Executive Lighting Designer, Hoare Lea Lighting

presentations.name: Intelligent lighting solutions; controlled efficiency in action
presentations.speakers: David Lorrison, Outdoor Segment Manager, Philips Lighting Academy
